events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to request a refund as soon as possible. Please advise on how to proceed.
The customer's request for refund due to wrong item received has been categorized under Refund.
Assigning the case to Agent Maria, who handles refund requests and returns.
Hello, this is Maria from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and would like a refund. I’m here to help you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 789654321 and the attached photo clearly shows the incorrect item I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid return shipping label to send the wrong item back.
Thank you for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid label and prompt refund.
The refund process has been completed and the return label sent to the customer’s email. Case resolved.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and have no further issues. Please let us know if you need anything else.
Closing this case as the refund was successfully processed and the customer is satisfied.
